node.excerpt: Long, long ago, Runfastus lived happily during the day and during the night. Runfastus ran quickly as he could over rock and over dust…
We all want to run fast, but sometimes it gets boring setting the same old incrementally more ambitious goal every year. That may be fine…
Biomechanics sounds like an intimidating concept. Like something you need a degree or two to really understand. But it really isn’t all that…
Treadmills hold no glory for the runner. The treadmill is where you go when you don’t want to face the cold of winter. The treadmill is…
Running shoes are a wealth of interest for a runner. As I’ve matured in the sport, I’ve expanded my arsenal of running shoes to be prepared…
